mapper.select: select * from sys_power sp left join sys_role_power srp on srp.power_id = sp.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srp.role_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and sr.enable = 1 and sp.enable = 1 and sp.type = 2

select * from sys_power sp left join sys_role_power srp on srp.power_id = sp.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = srp.role_id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = sr.id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and sr.enable = 1 and sp.enable = 1 and sp.type != 2 order by sp.sort asc
